page.title: 18The School Fete.
page.content: The Breakdancing and the Robotics will take place early in the afternoon. Following this is the school gymnastics which starts at 3.30pm. There are 4 houses, Wattes, Hollington, Tonyn, Dewyche taking part. The gymnastics are split up into Troups, Duets and Solos. The school team consists of 6 girls all having their own routines. The Duets and Solos display a theme. In the Solos are Nicola from Wattes, Emma from Hollington, Anna from Tonyn and Joanne from Dewyche acting out a theme to suit the music. The school fete is held every year in July and the gymnastics performance is one of the highlights, attracting favourable comments from a large and appreciative audience.
